com.riskgame.model

Class RiskPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.model.RiskPlayer

  • public class RiskPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the value associated to each player. It stores player's name of String type, total armyCount of player as Integer type, and the ArrayList of type Country which the player owns.
    Author:
    Shresthi Garg, Anusha
